description: Be prepared should disaster strike. This kit comes with the necessary essentials for a single person to help shelter, warm, feed and signal for help.Biohazard bag, dust masks and pair of nitrile gloves for personal protection.10-pack of emergency tissues.Multifunction knife with can opener, toothpick, tweezers, nail file, corkscrew, saw scissors, and Phillips and flathead screwdrivers.40-hour candle and 12-hour glow stick provide a dependable source of light.Multipurpose mylar sheet and blanket reflect heat and light.Emergency rain poncho is reusable and compact.CRC multifunction LED flashlight is powered by solar, hand-crank, or mobile charger. Includes AM/FM radio, compass and siren.SOS sign fits in the window of your vehicle or house.Includes 3600 calorie food bar, 10L water container and water purification tablet.CRC Personal First Aid kit with everything you need to treat minor wounds.CRC backpack holds entire kit, with reflective band across top for increased visibility.Packed dimensions are 40 x 36 x 26cm.
name: Canadian Red Cross Basic Disaster Preparedness 1-Person Kit.
